name: @danielkalen/data_table
description: Tiny library for displaying database-fetched data in an HTML table with front-end pagination

scripts.postversion: echo \'$(json -f package.json version)\' > .version.coffee && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run minify
scripts.compile: npm run compile:js && npm run compile:sass
scripts.compile:sass: fontsDir=dist/fonts foreach -g 'src/sass/*.sass' -x 'node-sass --functions $(pwd)/$npm_package_sassFns -x --output-style compressed {{path}} --output dist/css/ && npm run cssToScss -s'
scripts.compile:sass:debug: fontsDir=dist/fonts foreach -g 'src/sass/*.sass' -x 'node-sass --functions $(pwd)/$npm_package_sassFns -x --output-style nested {{path}} --output dist/css/ && npm run cssToScss -s'
scripts.watch: npm run watch:js & npm run watch:sass
scripts.watch:js: simplywatch 'src/coffee/*.coffee' -e 'coffee' -x 'simplyimport -i {{path}} | coffee -b -s -c > dist/js/{{name}}.debug.js && uglifyjs dist/js/{{name}}.debug.js -m -c keep_fargs,unused=false > dist/js/{{name}}.js'
scripts.watch:sass: fontsDir=dist/fonts simplywatch 'src/sass/*.sass' -e 'sass' -x 'node-sass --functions $(pwd)/$npm_package_sassFns -x --output-style compressed {{path}} --output dist/css/ && npm run cssToScss -s'

author: Daniel Kalen
